law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 455, sec. 40, effective July 1, 1991. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 38, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 101, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 24, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 1; and ch. 74, Art. IV, sec. 20(9). --- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 1. -- Created 1956 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, Art. X, sec. 14, effective September 1, 1956.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Certification of drivers and chauffeurs -- Requirements -- Duties of circuit clerk -- Cost of certificate -- Revocation or suspension of certificate -- Federal regulation.
